name: TokenAnalyst
description:
At TokenAnalyst, our aim is to provide transparency for the decentralized economy. 

We process and analyze every transaction on the blockchain itself, using cutting-edge machine learning techniques, deriving data-driven insights and metrics that enable investors, developers, and other stakeholders in this growing economy to fundamentally understand and value the plethora of crypto-assets available today.

team.name: Sid Shekhar
team.bioHtml: Current: Co-founder @TokenAnalyst | Alum of @Entrepreneur First, @Ucl, @Cornell University | Ex: @General Electric, @Cummins, @Quicken Loans, @noble energy

team.name: Jai Prasad
team.bioHtml: Crypto Fundamentals at @TokenAnalyst Software Engineer @SeedInvest . Former Co-Founder @EntryWire. Management Consultant @Accenture

team.title: Head of Engineering
team.name: Jendrik Poloczek
team.bioHtml: My name is Jendrik Poloczek. I live in London, and I work at TokenAnalyst. I worked in several companies ranging from early to mature startups.

jobs.title: Blockchain Research Analyst
jobs.description:
At TokenAnalyst we are building the intelligence layer for the decentralized economy. We are the leading provider of blockchain network and market data, and enable investors, researchers, hedge-funds, and traders gain insights on what’s going on in the crypto universe 

See us on 
- Bloomberg (https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-05-15/bitcoin-rally-is-masking-capital-flight-from-crypto-exchanges)
- Yahoo Finance (https://finance.yahoo.com/news/crypto-projects-promise-decentralisation-data-shows-thats-far-true-070013815.html)
- Forbes (https://www.forbes.com/sites/jeffkauflin/2018/10/29/where-did-the-money-go-inside-the-big-crypto-icos-of-2017/#5e26f75f261b)
- Business Insider (https://www.businessinsider.com/bitcoin-spike-led-by-market-whales-tokenanalyst-2019-4?r=US&IR=T)


This is a great role for someone who is looking to break into the blockchain space! 

What you’ll be doing:
- Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of blockchain data - learning the ins and outs of the decentralized economy in the process
- Discover inner workings of crypto protocols and convert these findings into tangible queries 
- Write scripts to automate the processing and cleaning of our data pipeline
- Experiment with innovative approaches to analyzing and interpreting blockchain data
- Contribute in a variety of ways as required for a growing startup, including: writing on our company blog, fixing bugs, and sometimes taking deep-dives into specific tokens/cryptoassets as required.
 
What we are looking for:
- You’re skilled in: Python and SQL (required)
- You have a passion for learning about the blockchain and diving into the crypto rabbit hole
- You are an avid learner and can find the means to quench your intellectual curiosity
- You are able to communicate your findings by leveraging data visualisation and data storytelling techniques
- You have some familiarity with working with and deploying to AWS
- You are comfortable working with git and the command line/shell
